text: Joel Crawford is an American storyboard artist and director. He is best known for his work on several DreamWorks Animation films, including The Croods: A New Age (2020). == Career == In 2006, Joel Crawford joined DreamWorks Animation, where he served as a story artist on Shrek Forever After, Rise of the Guardians, the Kung Fu Panda trilogy, The Lego Movie, and Bee Movie. In October 2017, Crawford signed on to direct The Croods: A New Age, replacing both Kirk DeMicco and Chris Sanders as director. In November 2017, Crawford directed Trolls Holiday, a half-hour Christmas-themed spinoff of the 2016 film Trolls. In March 2021, Crawford replaced Bob Persichetti as director of the 2022 film Puss in Boots: The Last Wish. == Filmography == Year Title Credited as Notes Story artist Director Actor 2007 Bee Movie Additional Story Artist 2008 Kung Fu Panda 2010 Shrek Forever After 2011 Kung Fu Panda 2 2012 Rise of the Guardians 2013 The Lego Movie 2015 The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water 2016 Kung Fu Panda 3 Trolls Head of story 2017 Trolls Holiday TV special 2019 The Lego Movie 2: The Second Part 2020 The Croods: A New Age Role: Guy's Dad 2022 Puss in Boots: The Last Wish Post-production == Accolades == Award Date of ceremony Category Film Result Golden Globe Awards February 28, 2021 Best Animated Feature Film The Croods: A New Age Visual Effects Society Awards April 6, 2021 Outstanding Visual Effects in an Animated Feature == References == == Other websites == * Category:Living people Category:American animators Category:American movie directors Category:American voice actors
